search.query: index=printing sourcetype="crealityGCODE" | rex field=source "(?<file>[^(\/|\')]+\.gcode)" | rex mode=sed field=plaLength "s/m//g" | rex mode=sed field=plaMass "s/g//g" | stats values(plaLength) as plaLength values(plaMass) as plaMass by file | lookup printlist.csv file OUTPUT finishedPrints | where finishedPrints>0 | eval printedLength=round(plaLength*finishedPrints,2), printedMass=round(plaMass*finishedPrints,2) | fields file finishedPrints plaLength printedLength plaMass printedMass
